extract: Thomas Holland (born 5 January 1968) is an English novelist, popular historian and podcaster. He is the author of many books, including works of classical history. He is especially known for the book Dominion on the history of Christianity. He has worked with the BBC to create and host historical television documentaries, and presented the radio series Making History. He currently co-hosts the podcast The Rest is History with the historian Dominic Sandbrook.
